commands_raw:
Astaroth: *mumbling*
---
Dalian: Excuse me, are you a resident here?
---
Astaroth: Obviously. Unless you're here to evict me.
---
$if clueNameSolomon {
Dalian: I'm investigating the death of a resident Mr. Solomon here.
---
Astaroth: Ah. The curious one. I warned him about reading things he didn't understand.
}
$else {
Dalian: I'm investigating a murder on the lower floor.
---
Astaroth: Don't tell me it's about Lady Grimory?
---
Dalian: No it's the person next room. I don't know his name yet.
}
signal(set,AstarothFirstTime,false)
-> questions
name: firstTime

commands_raw:
Dalian: I have some question to ask you
---

-> questions
name: secondTime

commands_raw:
Astaroth: I went to the upper floor into my room.
---
Astaroth: And was here. With my books. Same as every night.
signal(set,upperWent,true)
-> questions
name: where

commands_raw:
$if clueGun {
?> I heard you visited Grimory yesterday. -> Lying
}
?> Where were you during the time 7-9 PM yesterday? -> where
?> Did you know the victim personally? -> know
?> Did you hear or see anything unusual yesterday? -> hear
?> Leave
name: questions

commands_raw:
Astaroth: He borrowed a book once. Didn't return it. That about sums up our relationship.
signal(set,victimBorrowed,true)
-> questions
name: know

commands_raw:
Dalian: Did you hear or see anything unusual that night?
---
Astaroth: Unusual? For once, the building was quiet. Marchosias didn't have his nightly ravings like he usally does. 
signal(set,hearsMarchosiasScreams,true) 
---
Astaroth: First time in weeks I actually got some sleep
-> questions
name: Hear

commands_raw:
Dalian: Grimory said you visited her.
---
Astaroth: It was early in the morning, I don't have many books on sewing therefore I wanted to borrow one of her books to know more about the topic.
---
Dalian: Why are you so interested in sewing?
---
Astaroth: I am a scholar, I love knowledge, I'm something of a philomath myself.
---
Astaroth: Also some of the knowledge is overlapping with doctors knowledge about sewing wounds. 
---
Astaroth: You might be suprised how much you can learn by interdisciplinarity.
signal(set,bookConfirm,true)
-> questions
name: Lying
